name: Hex Find
description:
Use keyboard keys to move a selection hexagon around.

Find your goal hexagon and press enter before the timer runs out.

  • The hexagon shown on the pre-play screen is your goal hexagon. It's possible to deduce it during play by observing the colors formed by superimposing your goal/selection hexagon over the board, but it's easier to just memorize it!
  • Click a circle at the bottom of the pre-play screen to put 60, 30, or 15 seconds on the clock when you start play.
  • Play music (Peer Gynt's "Anitra's Dream") by turning off the audio mute at the bottom right of the pre-play screen.
  • Click anywhere else on the pre-play screen to begin play, or anywhere on the victory/loss screen to return to the pre-play screen.
  • If your browser is scrolling around as you press numbers on the number pad, turn on Num(ber) Lock.
